info.title: Puppilot Scribing API
info.description: API for managing scribing sessions, audio uploads, and transcription services.

post.description: Authenticate user and get an access token.

200.description: Successful login. Token valid for 1 hour.

post.description: Exchange a valid refresh token for a new access token to maintain an active session without requiring the user to re-authenticate.
Reset user password with token that was emailed.
Request a token to reset user password.

message.example: Password reset token sent to the provided email.

get.description: Retrieves details about the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: This endpoint does not require a request body.

patch.description: Change a user's password to a new one.

post.description: Creates a new recording session for scribing.

get.description: Retrieve information for a recording session

post.description: Generates a presigned URL for uploading audio files.

recording_session_public_id.description: The public ID of the recording session.

auto_scribe_template_public_id.description: The public ID of the scribe template to use for automatic transcription. Optional.

value.message: Presigned URL generated successfully. Use it to upload the audio file.

post.description: Request scribing for a recording session using a specified template.

get.description: Retrieve the status of a scribing request.
Retrieves details about the authenticated user's organization.

requestBody.description: This endpoint does not require a request body.

patch.description: Updates the organization's email notification settings.

email.description: The email address to be used for notifications.

200.description: Organization's email notification settings updated successfully.

message.example: Organization's email notification settings updated successfully.

example.message: Organization's email notification settings updated successfully.

put.description: Registers a webhook for a specific event type.

requestBody.description: Webhook details that need to be registered.

event_type.description: The type of event this webhook is listening for.

webhook_url.description: The endpoint where webhook notifications will be sent.

auth_token.description: A secret token used to authenticate webhook requests.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing required fields (e.g., signature, authorization).

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing Authorization header.

403.description: Forbidden - Signature mismatch or invalid auth token.

error.example: Signature mismatch or invalid auth token.

patch.description: Enables or disables a registered webhook for a specific event type.

requestBody.description: Payload to update the webhook status.

event_type.description: The type of event associated with the webhook.

is_active.description: Determines whether the webhook is active (`true`) or inactive (`false`).

organization_public_id.description: The unique identifier for the organization that owns the webhook.

status.description: If `false`, input was not related to medication.

reason.description: A brief explanation of why the input is relevant to veterinary medicine.

Plain English Concise.description: A concise summary of the medication details.

Plain English Summary.description: A detailed summary of the medication in plain English.

drug_name_and_classification.description: The name of the drug and its classification.

indications_and_uses.description: Medical conditions or treatments for which the drug is used.

pharmacology_and_mechanism_of_action.description: How the drug works in the body.

dosing_by_species.description: Recommended dosage and variations by species.

administration_and_route.description: How the drug is administered (oral, injectable, topical, etc.).

contraindications.description: Medical conditions or factors that prevent the use of this drug.

precautions_and_warnings.description: Important safety information, including risks in special populations.

adverse_effects.description: Possible side effects or reactions to the medication.

drug_interactions.description: Potential interactions with other medications or substances.

monitoring_parameters.description: Recommended monitoring tests and safety checks.

overdose_information.description: Signs of overdose and recommended treatment.

withdrawal_times.description: Withdrawal period for food-producing animals, if applicable.

client_information.description: Guidance for pet owners on safe use and handling of the medication.

notes.description: Additional relevant information about the medication.

post.description: Generates differential diagnoses based on clinical history.

status.description: Indicates whether the input was related to differential diagnoses.

reason.description: A brief explanation of why the input is relevant to veterinary medicine.

name.description: The name of the differential diagnosis.

cause_etiology.description: Description of the cause or etiology of the condition.

commonly_confused_with.description: Other conditions that may present with similar symptoms.

diagnosis_rule_outs.description: Diagnostic tests and rule-out methods to confirm or eliminate this diagnosis.

prognosis.description: The prognosis or expected outcome for the condition.

risk_factors_predispositions.description: Risk factors or predisposing conditions associated with this diagnosis.

symptoms_clinical_signs.description: The symptoms and clinical signs commonly associated with this condition.

Plain English Concise.description: A concise summary of the differential diagnosis findings.

Plain English Summary.description: A detailed summary of the differential diagnosis in plain English.

post.description: Generates differential diagnoses based on clinical history.

schema.description: A plain text block containing the differential diagnosis details.

post.description: Generates treatment plan based on diagnosis or clinical presentation and diagnostic findings.

status.description: If `false`, input was not related to treatment plans.

reason.description: A brief explanation of why the input is relevant to veterinary medicine.

Plain English Concise.description: A concise summary of the treatment plan.

Plain English Summary.description: A detailed summary of the treatment plan in plain English.

diagnosis_name.description: The name of the condition being treated.

treatment_plan_name.description: The name of the specific treatment plan.

treatment_goal.description: The objective of the treatment plan.

medications.description: Details of medications used in treatment, including name, dosage, and role.

dietary_management.description: Dietary recommendations for managing the condition.

lifestyle_modifications.description: Lifestyle adjustments to aid in treatment and recovery.

symptom_management.description: Methods used to manage symptoms associated with the condition.

regular_veterinary_monitoring.description: Frequency of follow-ups and recommended diagnostic tests.

owner_education.description: Key educational points for pet owners regarding the condition and treatment.

post.description: Generates treatment plan based on diagnosis or clinical presentation and diagnostic findings.

schema.description: A plain text block containing the treatment plan.

post.description: Provides single-turn conversational capabilities tailored for veterinary use cases.

200.description: Chatbot found an answer to the query.

status.description: If `false`, input was not related to treatment plans.

Plain English Concise.description: A concise summary of the answer.

Plain English Summary.description: A detailed summary of the answer in plain English.

post.description: Authenticate a user and get an access token.

200.description: Successful login for agent services. Token valid for a specific duration.

expires_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the access token expires.

refresh_expires_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the refresh token expires.

post.description: Provides multi-turn conversational capabilities with Puppilot, allowing a target context (e.g., a vet-owner chat) and the history of the ongoing chat with Puppilot to be included. This endpoint is used for engaging in a continuous dialogue where the agent remembers previous parts of the conversation (via chat_history) and can reference a specific external context (via chat_context). Requires Bearer authentication.

message.description: The latest message input from the user to Puppilot.
message.example: Yes please provide guidance on urgent signs

chat_context.description: The target context for the chat, e.g., a transcript of a conversation between an owner and a vet.
chat_context.example: Owner: Hi, my rabbit Nibbles has been acting strangely... Vet: Thank you, that's very helpful.

chat_history.description: The history of the ongoing chat conversation with Puppilot.

input.description: A previous message input from the user to Puppilot.
input.example: what can the owner do at home to treat GI stasis if they cannot get the rabbit to the vet

output.description: A previous message output from Puppilot.
output.example: For suspected rabbit GI stasis, veterinary evaluation is critical... Need guidance on feeding or urgent signs?

timestamp.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the chat history entry was recorded.

200.description: Successful response from the chat agent.

output.example: For Nibbles, urgent veterinary signs include: no fecal output or very small, dry pellets >24 hrs...

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input, missing required fields, or malformed JSON.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token.

value.message: Authentication token is invalid or expired.

X-API-Version.name: X-API-Version
X-API-Version.description: API versioning is required. Include the header `X-API-Version` with current version value in all requests.
